title: Enhancing e-Learning Practice Competencies: Inductive Discovery Learning for Organizational Argumentation Skills Development

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can identify errors occurring across six argumentation dimensions (e.g., illogicality, emotional appeal, black-and-white thinking) with 80% accuracy
Learners achieve over 75% improvement after performing three practical tasks of constructing logical rebuttal strategies targeting argumentation violations
Learners can demonstrate communication methods compliant with argumentation rules in real organizational scenarios through role-playing at a 90% fluency level
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
